name: BRDI-M aggregate estimates for companies with 1–4 employees, by questionnaire reference: 2016
description: BRDI-M aggregate estimates for companies with 1–4 employees, by questionnaire reference: 2016

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded R&D.
sources: National Science Foundation, National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, and U.S. Census Bureau, Microbusiness R&D and Innovation Survey, 2016.
